title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 315 - Employer Reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 315 - Employer Reporting

State Regulations
§ 315.1 - Background
§ 315.2 - Definitions
§ 315.3 - Employer reporting
§ 315.4 - Additional reporting requirements for elected or appointed officials who work for a participating employer of the Retirement System and are required to be reported to the Retirement System
§ 315.5 - Reporting requirements for service credit involving public safety overtime
§ 315.6 - Effective date

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 315

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§11, 34, 311, 334

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
